name: Cueyatl Warrior
movement: climb 20 ft., swim 30 ft., walk 30 ft.
description: The Cueyatl Warrior is a small humanoid creature with a lean build, known for its agility and combat versatility, particularly in jungle environments.
memorable: Its ability to deliver both slashing and poison damage makes it a formidable opponent in skirmishes.
goals: To hunt and ambush in jungle environments, using its agility and special abilities.
relations: Often found in groups with other Cueyatl or similar jungle-dwelling humanoids.
environment: Typically found in jungle terrains, adapting easily to both land and aquatic surroundings.
strengths: Excels in agility-based tasks and has special abilities that enhance mobility and stealth.
weaknesses: As a small creature, it may lack physical power against larger foes.
attacks: Wields a battleaxe, dealing slashing damage coupled with poison damage.
most_powerful_ability: The ability to breathe both air and water allows for versatility in aquatic confrontations.
senses: Possesses darkvision that allows it to see in darkness up to 60 feet.
skills: Has proficiency in Acrobatics and Survival, enhancing its mobility and resource gathering in complex terrains.
additional_information: Has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks in jungle terrain.
Benefits from the Slippery ability for escaping grapples.
Can execute long jumps good for ambush tactics.
Average hit points and armor class for resilience in combat.
Utilizes poison in melee attacks, increasing its lethality.
test_queries: small agile jungle warrior with poison attack
humanoid that can swim and climb
stealthy jungle creature with slippery escape
small creature that excels in jungle terrain
